Release notes release/0.6
=========================

Released 2018-04-10

Changes
~~~~~~~

-  Merge pull request #59 from miraculixx/patrick/enable-qualifer-access
   `ded29b7 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/ded29b7>`__
-  add management command to authorize a user
   `7f20e68 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/7f20e68>`__
-  enable qualifier access to other usersâ€™ databases
   `30148c7 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/30148c7>`__
-  Merge pull request #54 from miraculixx/patrick/update-ghpages
   `4037256 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/4037256>`__
-  Merge pull request #58 from miraculixx/patrick/add-remote-deploy
   `634124d <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/634124d>`__
-  add source-to-packaged code deploy update docs & tests, simplify
   custom backend and mixin configuration
   `d507f88 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/d507f88>`__
-  Merge pull request #57 from miraculixx/patrick/enable-jupyterhub
   `a4bf84d <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/a4bf84d>`__

   `4e9db40 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/4e9db40>`__

   `4df0a02 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/4df0a02>`__
-  enable jupyter hub instead of custom nb launcher
   `aa4d7df <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/aa4d7df>`__
-  add automated gridsearch logging
   `2a0b506 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/2a0b506>`__
-  enable content manager to setup omega in jupyterhub and locally
   `9315f58 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/9315f58>`__

   `18a46f6 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/18a46f6>`__

   `061094b <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/061094b>`__

~~~~~~~~~

-  fix docker build
   `c0e1e6c <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/c0e1e6c>`__
-  fix shippable particularity for test output
   `36a8958 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/36a8958>`__

   `13ec315 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/13ec315>`__

   `a81eefd <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/a81eefd>`__
-  fix erronous test on decision function
   `cac88bd <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/cac88bd>`__

   `92ff291 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/92ff291>`__

   `821bb75 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/821bb75>`__

   `e43c02b <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/e43c02b>`__
-  fix issues
   `707b55e <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/707b55e>`__

   `8375572 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/8375572>`__

   `ad37a78 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/ad37a78>`__

   `a0143d5 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/a0143d5>`__

   `7111771 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/7111771>`__

   `59d26ea <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/59d26ea>`__

   `667318d <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/667318d>`__

   `7fbf557 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/7fbf557>`__

   `5267a23 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/5267a23>`__
-  fixes for py3 migration
   `2a14f89 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/2a14f89>`__

   `a73d6bd <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/a73d6bd>`__

   `993415e <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/993415e>`__

   `2924458 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/2924458>`__

   `4d5d96e <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/4d5d96e>`__
-  fixes `c7aa08f <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/c7aa08f>`__
-  fix api tests
   `9e364a4 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/9e364a4>`__

Refactor
~~~~~~~~

-  refactor mixins
   `fd0037a <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/fd0037a>`__
-  refactors omegajobs, made jobs runnable on cluster via runtime
   `30abee4 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/30abee4>`__
-  refactored jobs content manager to work with omegastore instead of
   directly mongodb
   `6655f54 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/6655f54>`__
-  refactoring runtime, ensure configuration is always regarding a user
   `245c96a <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/245c96a>`__
